PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-09932003-06-18FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActBank Act
PrecisEnactment of the EXEMPTION FROM APPROVAL FOR CERTAIN INVESTMENTS IN INTRAGROUP SERVICE ENTITIES (BANK ACT) REGULATIONS which clarify that banks and certain other federally-regulated financial institutions may, without applying for the Superintendent's or the Minister's approval, invest in entities solely engaged in lending exclusively to members of their own group.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2003-0242 Publication Date: 2003-07-02
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Enactment of the EXEMPTION FROM APPROVAL FOR CERTAIN INVESTMENTS IN INTRAGROUP SERVICE ENTITIES (BANK ACT) REGULATIONS which clarify that banks and certain other federally-regulated financial institutions may, without applying for the Superintendent's or the Minister's approval, invest in entities solely engaged in lending exclusively to members of their own group.
